attributes.action: DO NOT INVOLVE US IN ANOTHER WAR! Peaceful support only!
attributes.additional_details: We want to ensure that the government do not declare war on Russia! There are many peaceful ways around this to reach an outcome. We do not need bloodshed and any more people losing their lives!
attributes.background: We want the government to ensure our safety and not involve us in a war. We stood back and did not defend other countries when their land was taken so why involve ourselves with something that is very clearly going to cause mass destruction and is going to have a catastrophic effect on us.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Do not send any UK military to Ukraine, and send aid only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609596
